name: ConwayDailySunCalendar
0:
”Alexa, ask Conway Calendar what's happening.”
”Alexa, ask Conway Calendar what's going on this weekend.”
”Alexa, ask Conway Calendar what's happening in Jackson, New Hampshire on Saturday morning.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: conway calendar
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Interactive access to all of the local event listings in the Mount Washington Valley and beyond from The Conway Daily Sun based on your location, radius, day, or time.

To get started, all you have to say is, “Alexa, ask Conway Calendar what’s happening” or “Alexa, ask Conway Calendar what’s going on.”

You can also specify a location, radius and day or time. Some example phrases are below:
Alexa, ask Conway Calendar what’s going on tonight.
Alexa, ask Conway Calendar what’s happening tomorrow afternoon.
Alexa, ask Conway Calendar what’s happening this weekend.
Alexa, ask Conway Calendar what’s going on next weekend in Austin, Texas.
Alexa, ask Conway Calendar what’s going on in Boulder, Colorado on Saturday morning.
Alexa, ask Conway Calendar what’s happening in Madison, Wisconsin on March 28.
Alexa, ask Conway Calendar what’s happening within five miles of Santa Rosa, California.
Alexa, ask Conway Calendar what’s going on tomorrow within ten miles of Provo, Utah.

Permissions:
*Device Address. Your device address will be used to provide responses with events local to your area.

Tips:
*If not otherwise specified, you will get today’s events.
*Allowing access to your device location allows that to be your default location, when no location is specified.
*To help Alexa understand what you say, it can be helpful to slightly pause after some words such as “ask”, and your city name.
*To help Alexa identify your specified city, be sure to include the state as well.
*To refine your results, you may specify time ranges such as morning, afternoon, or evening.
*To refine your results you may include a date or date range such as December 9, tomorrow, this weekend, next Friday, or next weekend.

Find more event details, create an account, or submit an event at https://www.conwaydailysun.com/site/calendar.html/
